title: Weirdest Thing, Random Questions, MTH and more.
itunes:title: Weirdest Thing, Random Questions, MTH and more.
description:
You know it's a problem when Steve apologizes and hands over the show to the two fools.  We ask the crew to tell us the weirdest thing they got caught red-handed doing.  Today Steve gets asked thee most random of questions.  Today we find out the signs that it is time to go back to church.  Fellas, if you want to know how to handle a break up, then hear what Big Dog has to say.  Uncle Steve gets to serve as judge in right or wrong between Tommy and Junior.  Does anybody want to know any pre-prep before sex to make it incredible?  We got something good for you.  Fool #2 murders another one in the spirit of Donna Summer.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve gives us one of the best life lessons which is stop comparing yourself to others, plus more.  Have a great weekend!!! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
You know it's a problem when Steve apologizes and hands over the show to the two fools.  We ask the crew to tell us the weirdest thing they got caught red-handed doing.  Today Steve gets asked thee most random of questions.  Today we find out the signs that it is time to go back to church.  Fellas, if you want to know how to handle a break up, then hear what Big Dog has to say.  Uncle Steve gets to serve as judge in right or wrong between Tommy and Junior.  Does anybody want to know any pre-prep before sex to make it incredible?  We got something good for you.  Fool #2 murders another one in the spirit of Donna Summer.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve gives us one of the best life lessons which is stop comparing yourself to others, plus more.  Have a great weekend!!!
